file: tmp_【#Reine2ndMEPtember】BABY 3D BIRTHDAY CONCERT!!! (Surprises Inside)【Pavolia Reine⧸hololiveID 2nd gen】 [Tmg_zSjOTtc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Loading screen with a pixel art DJ and dancing ducks.
Pavolia Reine performs 'Mixed Nuts' on stage with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: PLEASE WAIT...
subtitles.english: PLEASE WAIT...

subtitles.original:
Mixed Nuts
Official Hige Dandism
subtitles.english:
Mixed Nuts
Official Hige Dandism

subtitles.original: 袋に詰められたナッツのような
subtitles.english: Like nuts packed in a bag

subtitles.original: 世間では誰もがそれぞれでああだれかと寄り添い合ってる
subtitles.english: In this world, everyone is huddling with someone or other

subtitles.original: そこに紛れ込んだ僕らはピーナッツ
subtitles.english: We, who have mixed in there, are like peanuts

subtitles.original: みたいに木の実の振りしながら
subtitles.english: While pretending to be tree nuts

subtitles.original: 微笑み浮かべる
subtitles.english: We put on a smile

subtitles.original: 幸せのテンプレートの上 文字通り絵に描いたうわべの中
subtitles.english: On the template of happiness, within a literal picture-perfect facade

subtitles.original: テーブルを囲んで笑うその時さえ ありのままではいられないまま
subtitles.english: Even when laughing around the table, we can't remain as we truly are

subtitles.original: 隠し事だらけ 継ぎ接ぎだらけのHome, you know
subtitles.english: A home full of secrets and patchwork, you know

subtitles.original: 噛み砕いてもなくならない本音が 歯に挟まったまま
subtitles.english: True feelings that don't go away even if chewed, stuck in our teeth

subtitles.original: 不安だらけ 成り行き任せのLife, and I know
subtitles.english: A life full of anxiety and left to chance, and I know

subtitles.original: 仮初めまみれの日常を抜けて ここに僕がいてあなたがいる
subtitles.english: Escaping the everyday life full of transient things, I am here and you are here

subtitles.original: この真実だけでも胃がもたれてゆく
subtitles.english: This truth alone is enough to give me indigestion

subtitles.original: 化けの皮剥がれた一粒のピーナッツみたいに
subtitles.english: Like a single peanut whose disguise has been stripped away

subtitles.original: 世間から一瞬で弾かれてしまう そんな時こそ
subtitles.english: When we're cast out from society in an instant, that's exactly when

subtitles.original: 曲がりなりでよかったら側にいさせて 共に揺られ揺られ踏まれても
subtitles.english: If it's okay for me to be imperfect, let me stay by your side, even if we're tossed and stepped on together

subtitles.original: 割れない殻みたいになるから
subtitles.english: Because we'll become like a shell that won't break

subtitles.original: 生まれた場所の木の上か 地面の中かそれだけの違い
subtitles.english: Whether it's on a tree or in the ground, that's the only difference in where we're born

subtitles.original: 許されないほどみだらなこの世界を 等しく願えますように
subtitles.english: I hope we can wish for this world, so lewd it's unforgivable, equally

subtitles.original: 時に冷たくて 側が湿るのも, you know
subtitles.english: Even when it's cold sometimes and our sides get damp, you know

subtitles.original: 星のひとつも見つからない 雷に満ちた日があってもいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to have days filled with thunder where not even a single star can be found

subtitles.original: ミスだらけ アドレナリン任せのShow, but I know
subtitles.english: A show full of mistakes and left to adrenaline, but I know

subtitles.original: 所詮ひとかけの日常だから 腹の中にでも流してるよ
subtitles.english: It's just a fragment of everyday life after all, so I'm just washing it down into my stomach

subtitles.original: 隠し事だらけ 継ぎ接ぎだらけのHome, you know
subtitles.english: A home full of secrets and patchwork, you know

subtitles.original: とっておきも出来合いもぶち込んで かき混ぜて平らげながら
subtitles.english: Throwing in the special and the ready-made, mixing it up while finishing it off

subtitles.original: 普通なのない 正解なのないLife, and I know
subtitles.english: A life with no normal, no right answer, and I know

subtitles.original: 仮初めまみれの日常を抜けて ここに僕がいてあなたがいる
subtitles.english: Escaping the everyday life full of transient things, I am here and you are here

subtitles.original: この真実だけでも胃がもたれてゆく
subtitles.english: This truth alone is enough to give me indigestion

subtitles.original: このひとつまみの奇跡を噛み締めてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll savor this pinch of a miracle

subtitles.original:
ADAMAS
LiSA
subtitles.english:
ADAMAS
LiSA

subtitles.original: 大気迷土にシビレ切らした 不純の闇 怒号の渦の中
subtitles.english: Tired of the atmospheric labyrinth, in the midst of impure darkness and a vortex of roars

subtitles.original: 始まりに孤独は付き物さ
subtitles.english: Loneliness is a constant at the beginning

subtitles.original: 芯の底からも壁をぶち破れ 期待外れ 風向きかき回せ
subtitles.english: Break through the walls from the very core, defy expectations and stir up the wind

subtitles.original: 加速していくマグマの鼓動 確かめて進め
subtitles.english: Confirm the accelerating heartbeat of magma and move forward

subtitles.original: イヤついた
subtitles.english: I'm fed up with it

subtitles.original: 悲劇のような声がする
subtitles.english: A voice like a tragedy is heard

subtitles.original: 僕らは始まった 栄光のゴールに向かってさ
subtitles.english: We have begun, towards the goal of glory

subtitles.original: Shiny sword, my diamond 悲しみと願いの結晶体に僕らは誓う
subtitles.english: Shiny sword, my diamond, we swear upon the crystal of sorrow and prayer

subtitles.original: それぞれの光を目指してゆく 何度だって立ち上がってゆくんだ
subtitles.english: Aiming for our respective lights, we'll stand up again and again

subtitles.original: It's time. Wake up! この祈りが革命の確証さ 輝け
subtitles.english: It's time. Wake up! This prayer is the proof of revolution, shine!
